The group is launching an independent spending effort to convince Mike Pence to run, The group, "America's President Committee," begins a website, www.theconservativechampion.org, and a signature drive Monday. in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire.
